total_aum = serializers.FloatField(required=False, allow_null=True)
    total_employees = serializers.IntegerField(required=False, allow_null=True)

class RIAIndexResponseSerializer(serializers.Serializer):
    """Serializer for /ria/index response."""

    total_matches = serializers.IntegerField()
    rows = serializers.ListField(child=serializers.DictField())


class RIACompanyLookupResponseSerializer(serializers.Serializer):
    """Serializer for /ria/company/lookup response."""

    total_matches = serializers.IntegerField()
    matches = serializers.ListField(child=RIACompanyPreviewSerializer())
    pagination = serializers.DictField()

class RIAPdfRecordSerializer(serializers.Serializer):
    """Serializer for PDF metadata records."""

    # All fields are dynamic based on CSV columns
    pass  # Will be handled as DictField in practice


class RIALocationMetadataSerializer(serializers.Serializer):
    """Serializer for location metadata endpoints."""

    countries = serializers.ListField(child=serializers.CharField())
    cities = serializers.ListField(child=serializers.CharField())

class RIAActivityListResponseSerializer(serializers.Serializer):
    """Serializer for /admin/ria/activity response."""

    records = serializers.ListField(child=RIAActivitySerializer())
    pagination = serializers.DictField()
    filters = serializers.DictField()

class RIAActivitySummaryResponseSerializer(serializers.Serializer):
    """Serializer for /admin/ria/activity/summary response."""

    total_activities = serializers.IntegerField()
    by_activity_type = serializers.DictField()
    by_user = serializers.DictField()
